text: Francis Xavier Sudartanta Hadisumarta O. Carm. (13 December 1932 â€“ 12 February 2022) was an Indonesian Roman Catholic bishop. Hadisumarta was born in the Dutch East Indies. He became a priest in 1959. He was bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Malang, Indonesia, from 1973 to 1988 and as bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Manokwari-Sorong, Indonesia, from 1988 until his resignation in 2003.Francis Xavier Sudartanta Hadisumarta Sudartanta Hadisumarta died on 12 February 2022, at the age of 89. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Indonesian Roman Catholic bishops
title: Francis Xavier Sudartanta Hadisumarta
